jd: From: Dharani, VDart dharani.k@vdartinc.com Reply to: dharani.k@vdartinc.com Hello, Hope you are doing well,Please find the job description below; if you are interested, kindly let me know. Title: Business System AnalystDuration: ContractLocation: Philadelphia, PA(Onsite)Client: USTLocals RequiredExcept GC/ GC EAD and H1T, all Work Authorization is WorkableWhile sharing the resume, Please do mention the candidate location and Work Authorization Job Description :Data Profiling, Rdbms, Data Warehousing, Gap Analysis Skills Required:• At least 3 years with Data Warehouse, 5 years with SQL and 8 years on a BSA / Technical role• Solid Healthcare Domain Knowledge• BSA Experience in Data Warehouse projects (Preferably in Sourcing or Outbound Extracts)• Good Communication Skills• Good Analytical skills• Prepared Source to Target Mapping• Performed Gap Analysis / Data Profiling• Prepared Functional Specifications working with Business Responsibility:• Perform Data Profiling (Identify all data issues before getting the data to DW)• Prepare Functional Specification based on the interaction with Business and Technical teams• Prepare Mapping Document to be used by Dev and QA team (Detailed level required. Provide Joins, Filters and Ranking (if required) to get UNIQUE records)• Good understanding of RDBMS concepts• Present the draft version of Data Model• Perform UAT / Business Checkout using SQL Scripts Waiting for your response. Please share your available time so I can contact you directly by phone. Best Regards, Dharani KTechnical RecruiterVDart IncEmail: dharani.k@vdartinc.comLinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/in/dharani-krishnasamy-396116178/Website: www.vdart.comJoin VDart's Preferred Partner Program: https://www.vdart.com/suppliers/ Confidentiality Notice: The information contained in this message may be privileged and confidential and protected from disclosure.
